title: Why do I have to use a number 2 pencil?

options.label: B
options.text: To improve the accuracy of scoring

options.label: C
options.text: To make exams more accessible to people with disabilities

options.label: D

options.label: A
options.text: To ensure that the marks are dark enough to be sensed by the machine

options.label: B
options.text: To ensure that the marks are light enough to be erased without leaving a readable mark

options.label: C
options.text: To reduce the cost of the exam

options.label: D
options.text: To make the exam more accessible to people with disabilities

options.label: C
options.text: Advanced sensors that can detect almost any type of mark

options.label: D
options.text: Because it is better at blocking light than many inks

multiple-choice.question: What is the main difference between the machines introduced in the 1960s and 1970s and modern scoring machines?

options.label: A
options.text: The type of device used to sense marks

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: B

title: What if you never forgot anything?

options.label: C
options.text: The brain replays and strengthens connections between cells to create long-term memories.

options.label: D

multiple-choice.question: What is the most recent time that ice reached such a huge extent on Earth?
